thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: Edith
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Edith

author: Edith
title: Edith
text:
My first contact was with Bernie, who was most helpful. He gave me a Quote: number to make it easier when and quicker to find my Quote: .
I rang back and talked to Mary, a really lovely understanding lady. I was very much at home with her, and recommend her and Fast cover travel insurance. I even received a discount for being a second time customer.
